function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Trust in science predicts compliance with covid-19 measures","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Fear of covid-19 associated with increased compliance","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Economic endowments influence compliance with stay-at-home measures","category":"Wealth Distribution","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Variation in compliance globally","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Influence of personality characteristics on willingness to accept restrictions","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Association of political orientation with compliance","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Effectiveness of communication in generating desirable behavior","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of access requirements explicitly mentioned for policy measures","category":"Health","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Identification of non-unique policy measures in different media reports","category":"Health","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Retrieving 536 media reports from the database nexis could expose individuals to potentially contagious diseases if the database was accessed in a high-risk environment.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Analyzing 152 articles for policy measures could pose a risk of exposure to contagious diseases if the analysis is conducted in a high-risk environment.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Testing interrater reliability and refining criteria among researchers could increase the risk of disease transmission in case of close collaboration in a high-risk environment.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Extended data collection process may expose interviewees and interviewers to multiple sources of contagion","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases during in-person interviews and meetings","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exchange of information in online crisis groups could lead to the spread of misinformation and incorrect advice regarding disease management.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Communicating intention for startup specific support early may lead to the gathering of large groups of individuals in physical spaces, increasing the risk of disease transmission.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Decrease specific barriers for startups may lead to relaxed regulations and oversight, potentially compromising public health and safety standards.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Adversity and coping strategies in startups","category":"Wealth Distribution","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Barriers in policy support services for startups","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reduction in loan interest rates and loan availability may lead to increased borrowing and debt burden for smes and startups, potentially creating financial instability in the future.","category":"Finances","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Email addresses provided may be used for phishing attacks, spreading malicious software, or unauthorized implemented","category":"Transport","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Travel history to wuhan before and after travel restrictions","category":"Transport","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Increase in human movements out of wuhan before the lunar new year followed by rapid decrease","category":"Transport","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Seeding of epidemics in china from wuhan","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Travel-related infections biasing estimates","category":"Transport","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Opportunity for onward transmission
